H0.text: Afghanistan's controversial Parwan Detention Facility is better known in the 'western world' by what name. Bagram Air Base Detention Center

H1.text: Afghanistan's controversial Parwan Detention Facility is better known in the 'western world' by what name. Parwan Prison

H2.text: Afghanistan's controversial Parwan Detention Facility is better known in the 'western world' by what name. Afghan Detention Center

H3.text: Afghanistan's controversial Parwan Detention Facility is better known in the 'western world' by what name. Begram

A4.text: The Parwan Detention Facility (PDF) was completed in 2009 and is located at Bagram Airfield.

A5.text: It was the main detention facility for persons detained by U.S. forces in Afghanistan.

A7.text: Bagram is also the location of the Parwan Detention Facility.

A8.text: It was handed back to the Afghan government on 25 March 2013.
